mapper.sql: select l.fevttm , l.fgid , device_nm as flname , l.fuid , l.funm , l.fcdno , l.fevtcd , fn_getcommfvalue('code', 'evtcd', l.fevtcd) as fvalue1 , l.fauthtype , fn_getcommfvalue('code', 'evttype', l.fauthtype) as fvalue2 , (select fvisitnum from tuserinfo_main u where u.fuid = l.fuid and u.fpartcd1 =l.fpartcd1) as fvisitnum , l.fcstatus , fn_getcommfkind3('combo', 'COMBO_Fcardstatus', l.fcstatus) as fcstatusnm , l.futype , fn_getcommfkind3('combo', 'COMBO_Futype', l.futype) futypenm , l.fpartnm1 , l.fpartnm2 , l.fpartnm3 , l.fpartcd1 , fn_getcommfkind3('combo', 'COMBO_FSiteCode', l.fpartcd1) as fvalue3 , b.fpassvalue , b.fmatchvalue from tgatelog l left outer join device_info_tb d on device_id = l.fgid left outer join tgatelogbio b on l.fevttm = b.fevttm where 1=1

choose.otherwise: order by fevttm desc /*default:출입일자 기준으로 내림차순*/

mapper.select: limit #{srchCnt} offset #{offset}
select count(1) from tgatelog l left outer join device_info_tb d on device_id = l.fgid where 1=1

select u.fuid as fuid /*[LogInfo.getGateUserInfo]*/ , u.funm as funm , (select fkind3 from tcommcd where fkind1 = 'combo' and fkind2 = 'COMBO_Futype' and fvalue = u.futype) as futypenm , (select fkind3 from tcommcd where fkind1 = 'combo' and fkind2 = 'COMBO_FAuthType' and fvalue = u.fauthtype) as fauthtypenm , (select site_nm from site_tb where site_id = u.fpartcd1) as siteNm , ifnull(u.fpartnm1, '') as fpartnm1 , ifnull(u.fpartnm2, '') as fpartnm2 , ifnull(u.fpartnm3, '') as fpartnm3 , ifnull(u.fpartcd1, '') as fpartcd1 , ifnull(u.fpartcd2, '') as fpartcd2 , ifnull(u.fpartcd3, '') as fpartcd3 , ifnull(u.ftel, '') as ftel , ifnull(u.hp_no, '') as hpNo , ifnull(u.fcarno, '') as fcarno , DATE_FORMAT(u.fusdt,'%Y-%m-%d') as fusdt , DATE_FORMAT(u.fuedt,'%Y-%m-%d') as fuedt , DATE_FORMAT(c.fsdt,'%Y-%m-%d') as cfsdt , DATE_FORMAT(c.fedt,'%Y-%m-%d') as cfedt from tuserinfo_main u left outer join tcard_main c on c.fuid = u.fuid and c.fcdno = #{cfcdno} where u.fpartcd1 != '10' and u.fuid = #{fuid}

select u.fuid as fuid /*[LogInfo.getUserInfo]*/ , u.funm as funm , (select fkind3 from tcommcd where fkind1 = 'combo' and fkind2 = 'COMBO_Futype' and fvalue = u.futype) as futypenm , (select fkind3 from tcommcd where fkind1 = 'combo' and fkind2 = 'COMBO_FAuthType' and fvalue = u.fauthtype) as fauthtypenm , (select site_nm from site_tb where site_id = u.fpartcd1) as siteNm , u.fpartnm1 as fpartnm1 , u.fpartnm2 as fpartnm2 , u.fpartnm3 as fpartnm3 , u.fpartcd1 as fpartcd1 , u.fpartcd2 as fpartcd2 , u.fpartcd3 as fpartcd3 , u.ftel as ftel , u.hp_no as hpNo , u.fcarno as fcarno , DATE_FORMAT(u.fusdt,'%Y-%m-%d') as fusdt , DATE_FORMAT(u.fuedt,'%Y-%m-%d') as fuedt from tuserinfo_main u where u.fpartcd1 != '10' and u.fuid = #{fuid}

select fdt , fuid , fimg , fextdata , fquality , fregdt , fmoddt , ffailcnt , fsidx , fextfg , fsstatus , fqstatus , factdt , fqstdt , fwvname , fwedt , fwsdt from tbio_main where fuid = #{fuid} and fdt = 'T'
select fuid , fevttm , fcimg from tgatelogbio where fuid = #{fuid} and fevttm = #{fevttm} and fdt = 'F'
select DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') as curdt
select date_add(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'), interval-1 day ) as yester
select date_format('00:00:00', '%H:%i:%s') as defaultTime
select date_format(now(), '%H:%i') as curTime
select funm from (select funm, 1 as cf_sort from tuserinfo_main where fuid = #{fuid} union all select fcdno, 2 from tcard_main where fuid = #{fuid} ) t order by cf_sort limit 1 offset 0
select funm from tuserinfo_main where futype in ('9') and fuid = #{fuid}
select concat('방문증 ', fvisitnum) from tuserinfo_main where futype in ('5','6','7','8') and fuid = #{fuid}

select count(a.fuid) as cnt from ( select l.fcdno, l.fuid, sum(case when ( select 'f' from tcommcd where fkind1 = 'code' and fkind2 = 'evtcd' and fkind3 = l.fevtcd and fdoc like '%fail%') = 'f' then 1 else 0 end) as fvalue1, (select max(b.fpartcd1) from tgatelog b where b.fevttm = max(l.fevttm) and b.fuid = l.fuid) as fpartcd1 from tgatelog l where 1=1
and l.fpartcd1 = #{srchCond}
and l.fevttm >= #{stDateTime} and l.fevttm <= concat(#{edDateTime},':59')
and l.fcdno like concat('%',#{fcdno},'%')
and l.funm like concat('%',#{funm},'%')
group by l.fcdno, l.fuid ) a left join tuserinfo_main b on a.fuid = b.fuid and a.fpartcd1 = b.fpartcd1 where fvalue1 > 0
and IFNULL(b.fvisitnum,'') like concat('%', #{srchTVCardNum},'%') and b.futype = '9'
and IFNULL(b.fvisitnum,'') like concat('%', #{srchTVCardNum},'%') and b.futype in ('5','6','7','8')

select a.fcdno, a.fuid, a.fvalue1, a.fauthtype, a.fpartnm1, a.fpartnm2, a.fpartnm3, a.fpartcd1, b.fpartcd3 as fpartcd3 , b.fcarno as fcarno, b.fpartcd2 as fpartcd2, b.ftel as ftel, b.fvisitnum, b.futype, ( select fvalue from tcommcd where fkind1 = 'code' and fkind2 = 'evttype' and fkind3 = a.fauthtype ) as fvalue2, ( select fkind3 from tcommcd where fkind1 = 'combo' and fkind2 = 'COMBO_Fcardstatus' and fvalue = c.fstatus) as cfstatus, concat( case when b.futype = '9' then '임시' when b.futype in ('5','6','7','8') then '방문' end, ' ', b.fvisitnum ) as fvisitnm from ( select l.fcdno, l.fuid, max(l.fevttm) as fevttm, sum(case when ( select 'f' from tcommcd where fkind1 = 'code' and fkind2 = 'evtcd' and fkind3 = l.fevtcd and fdoc like '%fail%') = 'f' then 1 else 0 end) as fvalue1, (select max(b.fauthtype) from tgatelog b where b.fevttm = max(l.fevttm) and b.fuid = l.fuid) as fauthtype, (select max(b.fpartnm1) from tgatelog b where b.fevttm = max(l.fevttm) and b.fuid = l.fuid) as fpartnm1 , (select max(b.fpartnm2) from tgatelog b where b.fevttm = max(l.fevttm) and b.fuid = l.fuid) as fpartnm2 , (select max(b.fpartnm3) from tgatelog b where b.fevttm = max(l.fevttm) and b.fuid = l.fuid) as fpartnm3 , (select max(b.fpartcd1) from tgatelog b where b.fevttm = max(l.fevttm) and b.fuid = l.fuid) as fpartcd1 from tgatelog l where 1=1
and l.fpartcd1 = #{srchCond}
and l.fevttm >= #{stDateTime} and l.fevttm <= concat(#{edDateTime},':59')
and l.fcdno like concat('%',#{fcdno},'%')
and l.funm like concat('%',#{funm},'%')
group by l.fcdno, l.fuid ) a left join tuserinfo_main b on a.fuid = b.fuid and a.fpartcd1 = b.fpartcd1 left outer join tcard_main c on c.fuid = a.fuid and c.fcdno = a.fcdno where fvalue1 > 0
and IFNULL(b.fvisitnum,'') like concat('%', #{srchTVCardNum},'%') and b.futype = '9'
and IFNULL(b.fvisitnum,'') like concat('%', #{srchTVCardNum},'%') and b.futype in ('5','6','7','8')
order by a.fevttm desc limit #{srchCnt} offset #{offset}

select ${rowData} from ( select a.fcdno, a.fuid, a.fvalue1, a.fauthtype, replace(a.fpartnm1,'NULL','') as fpartnm1, replace(a.fpartnm2,'NULL','') as fpartnm2, replace(a.fpartnm3,'NULL','') as fpartnm3, a.fpartcd1, b.fpartcd3 as fpartcd3 , b.fcarno as fcarno, replace(b.fpartcd2,'(null)','') as fpartcd2, replace(b.ftel,'(null)','') as ftel, b.fvisitnum, b.futype, ( select fvalue from tcommcd where fkind1 = 'code' and fkind2 = 'evttype' and fkind3 = a.fauthtype ) as fvalue2, ( select fkind3 from tcommcd where fkind1 = 'combo' and fkind2 = 'COMBO_Fcardstatus' and fvalue = c.fstatus) as cfstatus, concat( case when b.futype = '9' then '임시' when b.futype in ('5','6','7','8') then '방문' end, ' ', b.fvisitnum ) as fvisitnm from ( select max(l.fevttm) as fevttm, l.fcdno, l.fuid, sum(case when ( select 'f' from tcommcd where fkind1 = 'code' and fkind2 = 'evtcd' and fkind3 = l.fevtcd and fdoc like '%fail%') = 'f' then 1 else 0 end) as fvalue1, (select max(b.fauthtype) from tgatelog b where b.fevttm = max(l.fevttm) and b.fuid = l.fuid) as fauthtype, (select max(b.fpartnm1) from tgatelog b where b.fevttm = max(l.fevttm) and b.fuid = l.fuid) as fpartnm1 , (select max(b.fpartnm2) from tgatelog b where b.fevttm = max(l.fevttm) and b.fuid = l.fuid) as fpartnm2 , (select max(b.fpartnm3) from tgatelog b where b.fevttm = max(l.fevttm) and b.fuid = l.fuid) as fpartnm3 , (select max(b.fpartcd1) from tgatelog b where b.fevttm = max(l.fevttm) and b.fuid = l.fuid) as fpartcd1 from tgatelog l where 1=1
and l.fpartcd1 = #{srchCond}
and l.fevttm >= #{stDateTime} and l.fevttm <= concat(#{edDateTime},':59')
and l.fcdno like concat('%',#{fcdno},'%')
and l.funm like concat('%',#{funm},'%')
group by l.fcdno, l.fuid ) a left join tuserinfo_main b on a.fuid = b.fuid and a.fpartcd1 = b.fpartcd1 left outer join tcard_main c on c.fuid = a.fuid and c.fcdno = a.fcdno where fvalue1 > 0
and IFNULL(b.fvisitnum,'') like concat('%', #{srchTVCardNum},'%') and b.futype = '9'
and IFNULL(b.fvisitnum,'') like concat('%', #{srchTVCardNum},'%') and b.futype in ('5','6','7','8')
order by a.fevttm desc ) a
